name: Kimmy
story: Kimmy grew up in a military family. She was encouraged by her father, a renowned general of the Moniyan Empire, to be straightforward, self-disciplined, and obedient. As a result, Kimmy developed a tomboy-ish character which everyone could see, be it in the way she dressed or in the way she spoke. Since childhood, Kimmy possessed a natural talent for research and innovation. Kimmy was always keen on analyzing and reforming chemical energies. However, her father felt differently about his daughter's passions. He wanted her daughter to completely stay away from war and everything related to the military and to live life like a normal person. Like all the teenagers, she rebelled against her father. In her opinion, except for the mechanical technology from the Eruditio and the mystifying magic power of the Magic Academy, a fusion of biotic and chemical energy could be the solution to many problems in the Land of Dawn. Over time, Kimmy's interests drove a wedge between her and her father. Beyond the minor quarrels between Kimmy and her father, Kimmy had achieved many great things. She had a passtion for creating new inventions. She believes that the shooting backpack she invented could finally make sense one day. Kimmy decided to take her inventions and enroll in the Empire Army to prove to her father that she was right.

passive.name: Chemist's Instinct
passive.desc: Kimmy can move and aim at other directions when using her Spray Gun, but is often less accurate. Her Spray Gun will only enjoy 50% of Physical Lifesteal. ####All the buffs on Attack Speed will be converted to Movement Speed buff for her.
passive.tips: Kimmy is still in movement while using skills. Keep the distance from enemies and attack them at the same time.

first_skill.name: Energy Transformation
first_skill.desc: Kimmy's Basic Attack will be changed into Chemical Ball. Each Chemical Ball deals 8/12/16/20/24/28///// points of Magic Damage. If Kimmy fails to hit a target, the Chemical explodes upon travelling a certain distance, and deals same damage to nearby enemies. ####This skill enjoys only 40% of Spell Vamp. ########Use Again: Return to normal Basic Attack.
first_skill.tips: Use 1st skill to attack enemies at a long distance. When enemies are around you, attack as many enemies as possible.

second_skill.name: Chemical Refinement
second_skill.desc: Kimmy shoots out the enhanced Chemical Spray and the recoil in turn pushes her backwards for a certain distance. The spray then falls down to the ground and creates contaminated areas. Enemies who walk on these areas will take 14/16/18/20/22/24///// points of Magic Damage every 0.5/0.5/0.5/0.5/0.5/0.5s and become slowed by 40%/40%/40%/40%/40%/40%. ####Regenerates 20/28/36/44/52/60 points of energy using this skill.
second_skill.tips: When chased after by enemies, use 2nd skill to slow them down.

ultimate.name: Maximum Charge
ultimate.desc: Kimmy creates Luminous Chemical Attacks after charging. Kimmy's Luminescent Attack travel a certain distance, dealing 238/356/475// points of Magic Damage to enemy units and 198/297/396// points of Magic Damage to enemies nearby. ####Regenerates 30/30/30 points of energy if Kimmy hits a target with this skill.
ultimate.tips: 3rd skill is of long range. When enemies intend to attack you, you can target them in advance; when enemies try to run away, use it to reap them.
